turkish_example_sentence: Siz sıcak Akdeniz sahilinde yazlık daire istememiş olsaydınız, soğuk dağ evinde kalırdınız
english_example_sentence: If you had not wanted the summer apartment on warm Mediterranean coast, you would have stayed in the cold mountain house
